resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards- No 7:THe bag they had missed</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten kein Beutel 7:THe, den sie vermißt 
hatten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de lecture aucun sac 7:THe qu'ils avaient 
manqué</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões da leitura nenhum saco que 7:THe tinham 
faltado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi della lettura nessun sacchetto che 7:THe 
avevano mancato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - κανένα 7:THe δεν τοποθετεί σε 
σάκκο αυτοί είχε λείψει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas de la lectura ningún bolso 7:THe que 
habían faltado</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an assignment where the student is required to read and understand the general meaning, main ideas and sequence of events in a text. and use this knowledge as needed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thinking skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Anweisung, in der der 
Kursteilnehmer, die allgemeine Bedeutung benoetigt wird, die 
Grundgedanken und die Ereignisreihenfolge in einem Text zu lesen und 
zu verstehen und dieses Wissen zu verwenden, wie gebraucht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation où l'étudiant est requis 
de lire et comprendre la signification générale, les idées 
principales et la séquence d'opérations dans un texte et d'utiliser 
cette connaissance comme nécessaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição onde o estudante seja 
requerido ler e compreender o meaning geral, as idéias principais e a
seqüência de eventos em um texto e usar este conhecimento como 
necessitado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione dove l'allievo è tenuto 
a leggere e capire il significato generale, le idee principali e la 
serie di eventi in un testo ed ad usare questa conoscenza come stata 
necessaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει για 
να διαβάσει και να καταλάβει τη γενική έννοια, τις βασικές ιδέες
και την ακολουθία γεγονότων σε ένα κείμενο και να χρησιμοποιήσει 
αυτήν την γνώση όπως απαιτείται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación donde requieren al 
estudiante leer y entender el significado general, las ideas 
principales y la secuencia de evento en un texto y utilizar este 
conocimiento según lo necesitado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">denkende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de pensée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ordre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades pensando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seqüência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità pensanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sequenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες σκέψης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακολουθία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de pensamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">secuencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
